#labels linux,Ubuntu,automation
=Build XVM=
  # `sudo apt-get update`
  # `sudo apt-get install libmono2.0-cil mono-runtime mtasc patch svn swfmill zip`
  # `svn checkout https://wot-xvm.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ wot-xvm`
  # `cd wot-xvm/utils/build-system-linux`
  # `./build-xvm.sh`
  # grab your XVM from `wot-xvm/bin`
